thread.title: Viral video: She was walking wearing sleeveless top and jeans — Know what happened next
thread.title_full: Viral video: She was walking wearing sleeveless top and jeans — Know what happened next

title: Viral video: She was walking wearing sleeveless top and jeans — Know what happened next
text:
A video showing a girl being eve-teased by a man has gone viral on social media and has been viewed thousands time. 
In the video, a girl, clad in jeans and a cut sleeve top, is seen talking on her phone as she walks in a park. One of the two men, who were also sitting in the same park, tries to draw her attention and starts making unwanted gestures at her. 
The other guy, who was sitting next to him, however, gets disturbed by it and tries to stop his friend. 
Shared by Varun Pruthi, it leaves a message for viewers at the end -- 'kapde nahi soch badlo' (Change your mindset and not your clothes). 
Check out the video here:  19 More from zeenews
